attributes.action: Take away the extra lane at traffic lights in London. Make any extra lanes left or right turn only and stop the opportunity for dangerous undertaking
attributes.additional_details: Take away the extra lane at traffic lights in London. Make any extra lanes left or right turn only and stop the opportunity for dangerous undertaking manoeuvres. It slows traffic flow and is a major cause of accidents.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
